item.title: Visual Studio Code
item.description: Visual Studio Code Visual Studio Code (or VSCode) is source code editor developed by Microsoft and open source community. It is one of the most popular editor/IDE. It has built-in support for JavaScript, TypeScript and Node but it also can be extended to work with other programming languages and technologies. Links code.visualstudio.com GitHub
Microsoft MVP Microsoft Most Valuable Professional Links https://mvp.microsoft.com/en-US/Nomination/nominate-an-mvp
